articles.content: The European Union and the Irish Government have brushed off a threat from British foreign secretary Liz Truss to trigger article 16 of the Northern Ireland protocol if she fails to win more concessi… [+3033 chars]

articles.title: Europe nuclear plants 'need 500 bn euro investment by 2050': EU commissioner - Guardian
articles.description: The European Union will need to invest 500 billion euros ($568 billion) in new generation nuclear power stations from now until 2050, the bloc's internal market commissioner said in an interview published at the weekend.
